enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a shallow copy of the element, which requires similar object initialization and attribute copying.
The doClone method is used internally for creating a deep copy of the element, which shares similarities in object initialization and attribute handling.
Clearing attributes before cloning ensures that the cloned element starts with a clean state, which is relevant for maintaining the integrity of the clone.
Removing specific attributes before cloning can be useful to customize the cloned element's state, ensuring it matches the desired configuration.
